summary: The team discussed and approved Sprint SP-001, focusing on foundational MVP features including mock login, adding employee profiles, and searching the employee directory to create a testable end-to-end CRUD loop.

decisions.title: Approve Sprint SP-001
decisions.details: Group of three user stories: US-010 (Mock Login), US-015 (Add Employee Profile), US-001 (Employee Directory Search) for foundational employee management.

sign_offs.what: Approved and saved Sprint SP-001, updating stories to 'In Sprint'

actions.task: Confirm start of Sprint SP-001 execution by saying 'yes' or 'start'

backlog_deltas.title: Sprint SP-001 added with rationale for foundational features
